game.name: Frame of Mind - A game of thoughts.
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 게임 메뉴 음성 안내, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 서라운드 사운드, 터치 전용 옵션, Steam Cloud, Source SDK 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Frame of Mind - A game of thoughts is a brief and cozy narrative game that lets you explore a character via thoughts and momentos you find in stages of their life. Its an introspective game, meant to share some experiences a peer-group of neurodivergent queers, including the dev, had growing up.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Frame of Mind - A game of thoughts is a brief and cozy narrative game that lets you explore a character via thoughts and momentos you find in stages of their life. Its an introspective game, meant to share some experiences a peer-group of neurodivergent queers, including the dev, had growing up.
